conv.text: Hello, I'm a reporter and I'm here to interview you about your win at the HUJI Hackathon of Generative AI. How did you manage to win?

answers.option: I used a program to generate realistic images from a set of parameters.
I don't want to talk about it.

conv.text: That's amazing! What kind of implications does this have for the future?

answers.option: It can be used for facial recognition, medical imaging, and more.

conv.text: I understand, but I'm sure your story would be inspiring to many. Are you sure you don't want to talk about it?
That's incredible! Your work is truly inspiring. Thank you for your time, I wish you all the best in the future!
It was a pleasure talking to you. Goodbye!
